data.title: Brick Breaker
data.desc: This Brick Breaker game is a reimagination of the classic arcade game, built using JavaScript and the HTML5 canvas. It was one of my first projects using JavaScript and was created as a way to become more familiar with the language. The game features hand-designed levels and is built in a way that allows for easy creation of future levels using a JSON file.
data.abrDesc: Brick breaker game in JS and HTML canvas

data.title: Stack Builder
data.desc: This is a small game that was inspired by a popular mobile game. It was built using THREE.js and the cannon physics engine to ensure that the particles fall realistically. The game is written in TypeScript and is fully playable - my high score is 27. .
data.abrDesc: Block stacking 3D game w/ physics engine

data.title: Real time chat application w/ React
data.desc: Had a lot of fun building this little application. This is a full-stack application that uses firebase on the backend to store messages and for user authentication. On the fontend I used react, and as I type out this description I'm realizing that I never completely finish stylizing some parts of the chat, but the rest is functional. I promise!
data.abrDesc: Real time chat application that uses Firebase (backend) and React (frontend)
